title: RHONY's Leah McSweeney
description:
RHONY’s Leah McSweeney is a bad-ass bitch with a killer clothing line, Married To The Mob. Hear how she does it all – run a business, raise a child, stay sober, and keep it real on TV – without losing her cool! She talks streetwear, Rhianna, motherhood, and her future on RHONY. Plus, Lala is having a blast on the GTL Live tour, and shares some more of a her fav moments meeting her crew!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
